page.title: 12Packwood House Garden
page.content:
Packwood House is famous for its big yew tree garden.People say the huge yew trees represent the sermont on the mount.The oldest trees are 200years old.They are clipped once a year.They are good for hide and seek.
On the house walls are 7 sundials.They are accurate in the winter _G M T _ but are 1 hour behind in the summer.
There is a lovely walled garden with 150 different kinds of flowers.There is a sunken pond.In one of the walls there is a fireplace which was used to heat the wall and warm the peach trees so that the blossom would set and form fruit.it is 200 years old.
